item.title: Flight Management Computer Systems (FMCS includes Thrust Management Function) – One Inoperative

numlitem.para: En route operations do not require its use, and
For Combi, if ballast fuel is carried, stabilizer tank remains empty and CWT fuel in excess of ballast fuel may not be carried.

note.para: Stabilizer tanks are not installed on UPS aircraft.
Any mode which functions normally may be used.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Refer to “FMC L, R” procedure in the AOM/QRH.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "LEFT or RIGHT FMCS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
